thread.title: DeLowry bromance highlights- best friendship in the league
thread.title_full: DeLowry bromance highlights- best friendship in the league

title: DeLowry bromance highlights- best friendship in the league
text:
Jan. 29 2016 3:46 PM Kyle Lowry and DeMar DeRozan Are Best Friends A tribute to the NBA’s greatest bromance. Bros. Claus Andersen/Getty Images 
DeMar DeRozan and Kyle Lowry are very good at basketball—good enough, it turns out, to play alongside each other in the NBA All-Star Game on their Toronto home court. When Raptors fans watch DeRozan and Lowry, they’re not just looking at the best guard tandem in the NBA. They’re also seeing best friends. Like, get-them-bunk-beds best friends. 
That beautiful, unconditional bromance has escalated throughout their four seasons as teammates. On the court, DeRozan and Lowry share a telepathic ability to connect on alley-oops. Off the court, they hang out together, mock each other , conduct playful interviews , and generally carry on like brothers. Advertisement 
Watch the video above to see the definitive tribute to the NBA’s most-endearing friendship. You’ll laugh, you’ll cry, and you’ll make fun of DeRozan’s math skills. 
A.J. McCarthy is a Slate writer and producer. 
Anya Schultz is a Slate Video intern. Load Comments
